whoWeAre.title: Who we are
whoWeAre.description: We embrace a strategic approach to creative ideas. We are interested in people and human relationships. This is the main thing you need to know about us. We believe in the power of bold ideas that can solve business challenges.

description.text1: We create additional value for companies, products, services as well as verbal and visual ways to deliver it to the audience.
description.text2: We strive to create communications that can increase media performance. We use everything — words, meanings, stories, art, movies.
description.text3: We create business growth strategies, from the moment of its birth to the achievement of the necessary business indicators.

services.title: Process
services.content: Air is a full service creative agency

subcontent.p1: Deep analytics, strong strategy and bright creative ideas.
subcontent.p2: We are sure that first-rate job is possible only if all three components are united.

person1.name: Tal Gilad
person1.comment: AIR’s ideas are refreshing and out of the box. Authentic team that focuses on the important path of the brand.

person2.name: Azadeh Hawkins
person2.comment: AIR is an exceptional agency that leads with creative talent, first-class account servicing.

person3.name: Michel Grover
person3.comment: AIR raises the agency bar to stratospheric heights on both creative output and client service.

shapes.title: Vision, Passion, Results
shapes.subtitle: We are sure that first-rate job is possible only if all three components are united.
